ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 167
ygData.msgSnippet: When you see the raiders in the distance, walk inlands and around them and then back down to the coast. Or get a invisibility to pass them. Or get a teleport
ygData.messageBody:
When you see the raiders in the distance, walk inlands and around them and
then back down to the coast.
Or get a invisibility to pass them.
Or get a teleport by a druid to east karana, see to it that you are invis if
you are KOS by the druids.

Drokk, lvl 41 shaman

"Rose M. Glass" wrote:

> From: "Rose M. Glass" <rosemg@...>
>
> Hello all
>
> I have a question. This poor warrior on the Prexus server
> need to know where Milea Clothspinner ( the sister that starts
> this quest is in Qyenos, you have to give this Milea a letter )
> cave in East Karanas.
>
> And could you please tell me the best way to get there
> from West Karanas. I have died more times than I want
> to say trying to get there. I have hugged the coast but
> every time I get to North Karanas Radiers near the coast
> kill me.
>
> Thank you
> Ranala level 10 warrior who is wondering if she will ever
> get to East Karanas in one piece.
>
> > Get paid to surf the web! Free!
> http://www.alladvantage.com/go.asp?refid=bvf753
